wikipedia_page.main: Sir John William Denys Margetson  (9 October 1927 – 17 October 2020) was a British diplomat who served as ambassador to Vietnam, the United Nations, and the Netherlands.

response: *1927 – John Margetson, English scholar and diplomat, British Ambassador to the Netherlands (d. 2020)
